# This file was generated by CMakeLists.txt
# Modify as u want.

set(target_name VulkanFramework)
set(target_src "main.cpp")
set(target_libs ${Vulkan_LIBRARIES} ${GLog_LIBRARIES} ${GLFW_LIBRARIES})

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})
aux_source_directory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Vk VkSrcFiles)
list(PREPEND target_src ${VkSrcFiles})

add_executable (${target_name} ${target_src})
target_link_libraries(${target_name} ${target_libs})
